original_text: Your brave soldiers will fall. They will lie flat on the ground. They cannot stand and fight because the Lord will knock them down. Your brave soldiers will fall. They will lie flat on the ground. They cannot stand and fight because the Lord will knock them down. Your brave soldiers will fall.
korean_text: 너희 장사들이 쓰러짐은 어찌함이냐 그들이 서지 못함은 여호와께서 그들을 몰아내신 까닭이니라

sentences.original_text: They will lie flat on the ground.
because the Lord will knock them down.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 주께서 그들을 쓰러뜨리실 것이기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: They will lie flat on the ground.
because the Lord will knock them down.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 주께서 그들을 쓰러뜨리실 것이기 때문이다.
